title: Juniata Valley Council Training Committee
text:
Welcome
We are so glad that you found us! We are here to be a training resource to the Juniata Valley Council Scouters. In these pages, you can find information on:
Further resources are available at the National Scouting America Training website.
The training newsletter will be sent to all registered scouters. Please add juniatavalleycouncil@247scouting.com to your safe senders list so you can receive this and other upcoming events in the Juniata Valley Council.

title: About the Team

Join the Team
Do you like to work with other adults? Join the team! Training others is fun

title: Position Specific Training
text:
Training matters. A trained leader can do it easier and then it becomes more fun.
There is required training for all of those in any kind of leadership positions like Council President, Cubmasters/Scoutmasters, Merit Badge Counselors, Chartering Organization Representatives, Youth leaders of National Youth Leadership Program, and more!

title: Hazardous Weather
text:
What: Hazardous Weather Training
When: Every 2 years
Who: required training for some positions
Where: Click here to take Hazardous Weather
Alternatively navigate to training by:

Log in to: https://my.scouting.org/
Click on My Training
Click on ScoutsBSA
Click on Catalog
Click on Programs
Type ‘hazardous weather’ in the search bar

title: Safeguarding Youth Training
text:
When: Required Every 1 year
Who: all BSA new and registered volunteers aged 18+
Where: Click here to take Safeguarding Youth Training
Alternatively navigate to training by:

Log in to: https://my.scouting.org/
Click on My Training
Click on ScoutsBSA
Click on Catalog
Click on Programs
Type ‘safeguarding youth’ in the search bar
